overview: Just an ordinary suburban family- except that Dad's transgender, Mom's queer, and there are five kids in this minivan. This is one familyâ€™s true story of identity, trust, and transformation. Too many transgender kids wonder: Will I be loved? Will I get to have a family? Will it all be ok? Here's the answer: a love story about family, finding your true self, and becoming who you really are.
title: Just Another Beautiful Family
